title: Adding and Subtracting Matrices
body: For the following exercises, use the matrices below and perform the matrix addition or subtraction. \\n $$A=\begin{tabular} {| c | c |} \hline 1 & 3 \\ \hline 0 & 7 \hline \end{tabular}$$, $$B=\begin{tabular} {| c | c |} \hline 2 & 14 \\ \hline 22 & 6 \hline \end{tabular}$$, $$C=\begin{tabular} {| c | c |} \hline 1 & 5 \\ \hline 8 & 92 \\ \hline 12 & 6 \hline \end{tabular}$$, $$D=\begin{tabular} {| c | c |} \hline 10 & 14 \\ \hline 7 & 2 \\ \hline 5 & 61 \hline \end{tabular}$$, $$E=\begin{tabular} {| c | c |} \hline 6 & 12 \\ \hline 14 & 5 \hline \end{tabular}$$, $$F=\begin{bmatrix} 0 & 9 \\ 78 & 17 \\ 15 & 4 \end{bmatrix}$$
